title: A Scientist's Mission To Break The Itch-Scratch Cycle
teaser: Dr. Gil Yosipovitch is a leading scientist in the field of itch. He says he hopes to gain more respect for the debilitating power of chronic itch â€” and to get more doctors on the search for a cure.
